parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

ParkingFacility.description: Indicates if the address given is a Parking lot: true or false.

ParkingSpot.description: Indicates location of the Charging Station withing a parking house. Example: E27

ChargingModes.description: List of charging modes that are supported.

CPOPartnerSessionID.description: Optional field containing the session id assigned by the CPO to the related operation.

EMPPartnerSessionID.description: Optional field containing the session id assigned by the EMP to the related operation.

Result.description: Message was received, the respective operation was performed or not performed successfully.

ERoamingAcknowledgement.description: The acknowledgement is a message that is sent in response to several requests.

EvseData.description: A list of EVSE data blocks that are each assigned to a certain operator.

StatusCode.description: This can be used e.g. for failure messages or further information regarding the result.

EvseStatuses.description: A list of EVSE status blocks that are each assigned to a certain operator

StatusCode.description: This can be used e.g. for failure messages or further information regarding the result

EVSEStatusRecords.description: A list of EVSE status records

StatusCode.description: This can be used e.g. for failure messages or further information regarding the result
This can be used e.g. for failure messages or further information regarding the result.

Accessibility.description: A list of Accessibility types whose EVSE's a provider wants to retrieve.

AuthenticationModes.description: A list of authentication codes whose EVSE's a provider wants to retrieve.

CalibrationLawDataAvailability.description: List of calibration law availability data type

CountryCodes.description: A list of countries whose EVSE's a provider wants to retrieve.

GeoCoordinatesResponseFormat.description: Defines the format of geo coordinates that shall be provided with the response.

IsHubjectCompatible.description: RenewableEnergy fro whose EVSE's a provider wants to retrieve.

IsOpen24Hours.description: IsOpen24Hours fro whose EVSE's a provider wants to retrieve.

LastCall.description: In case that this field is set, Hubject does not return the currently valid set of EVSE data but the changes compared to the status of EVSE data at the time of the last call.

OperatorIds.description: A list of Operator Ids in ISO or DIN standard to download only EVSE's of one or more operators.

RenewableEnergy.description: RenewableEnergy fro whose EVSE's a provider wants to retrieve.

SearchCenter.description: The data can be restricted using search parameters that are provided in this field. Cannot be combined with LastCall.
The data can be restricted using search parameters, which are provided in this field

EvseID.description: The list MUST not contain more than 100 EVSEIDs

OperatorID.description: A list of Operator Ids in ISO or DIN standard to download only EVSE's of one or more operators.

ActionType.description: Describes the action that has to be performed by Hubject with the provided data.
Describes the action that has to be performed by Hubject with the provided data.

OperatorEvseData.description: A list of EVSE data blocks that are each assigned to a certain operator.

Accessibility.description: Specifies how the charging station can be accessed.

AuthenticationModes.description: List of authentication modes that are supported.

ChargingFacilities.description: List of facilities that are supported.

ChargingPoolID.description: Evses may be grouped by using a charging pool id

ChargingStationID.description: The ID that identifies the charging station.

ChargingStationNames.description: List of charging station name in different language

ClearinghouseID.description: Identification of the clearing house in case of roaming between different clearing houses must be processed in the future.

DynamicInfoAvailable.description: Does the operator send a EVSEStatus information for this EVSERecord?

EvseID.description: The ID that identifies the charging spot.

GeoChargingPointEntrance.description: In case that the charging spot is part of a bigger facility, this attribute specifies the facilities entrance coordinates.

HotlinePhoneNumber.description: Phone number of a hotline of the charging station operator.

IsHubjectCompatible.description: Is eRoaming via intercharge at this charging station possible?

IsOpen24Hours.description: Set in case the charging spot is open 24 hours.

OpeningTimes.description: Opening time in case that the charging station cannot be accessed around the clock.

OperatorID.description: The provider whose status records are listed below.

PaymentOptions.description: List of payment options that are supported.

Plugs.description: List of plugs that are supported.

ValueAddedServices.description: List of value added services that are supported.

deltaType.description: Changes compared to the last call in case that the operation was “PullEVSEData” with “LastCall” parameter.

lastUpdate.description: The attribute indicates the date and time of the last update of the record.
